title: About Daniel Vargas ~ Web Developer
heading: Hi! I'm Daniel Vargas
caption: I am a Salvadoran web developer, passionate about creating modern, functional, and accessible interfaces. I enjoy writing clean code and designing experiences that not only look good but also solve real problems efficiently and elegantly.
quote: I build the internet I would like to browse
